name: Bitbucket Dark
description: Dark/black theme for bitbucket.org. Main focus is on pull request review view but others work pretty ok also. Tested only on Chrome.
additional_info:
Version 0.5
  • Initial version
  • Code review works
  • Repository overview works
  • Source code view works decently

discussions.name: Merge conflict notifications, code highlighting, and inline code are off.
Looks nice, but missing a body tag
